app-settings.save-dynamic-props: Save dynamic props with the drawing
app-settings.embed-library-data: Embed library data in the drawing

backend-connection-dialog.plain-password-warning:
Keep in mind that the password is stored in plain text.
Are you sure you want to save the password?
backend-connection-dialog.title: Connect to the backend server...
backend-connection-dialog.cannot-connect: Cannot connect to the backend. Message is following:

drawing-merge-dialog.title: Drawing merge options...
drawing-merge-dialog.save-drawing: ...and save the drawing before opening the new one
drawing-merge-dialog.choose-one-option: Please choose one of the options above

element-props-sidebar.confirm-component-class-change:
Changing component class will disconnect all links connected to it.
Also, the values of the component properties that absent in the new class will be lost.

Continue?
element-props-sidebar.confirm-link-class-change:
Changing link class will make the values of the link properties that absent in the new class to be lost.

Continue?
element-props-sidebar.name: name
element-props-sidebar.adding-new-field: Adding a new field to the prop
element-props-sidebar.deleting-new-field: Deleting a field from the prop
element-props-sidebar.confirm-deletion: Really delete a field {{what}} from the "{{from}}" prop?

hints.drag-component: Drag the component to move it, "ctrl-click" to transform or "ctrl-shift-click" to adjust
hints.drop-component: Drop the component where you want to leave it...
hints.rotate-component: Rotate the component around the center mark or click to switch to the scaling mode
hints.scale-component: Drag any handle to scale, drag the center to move or click to switch to the rotaion mode
hints.adjust-component: Click on any adjustment tool to adjust (edit) the corresponding component prop
hints.adjust-component-prop: Drag any free (green) handle to adjust the corresponding component prop

main.ask-for-unsaved-changes:
The current drawing has unsaved changes.
Do you want to save it before {{opName}}?

status-bar.backend-url: Backend server URL we are currently connected

url-type.file-abs: File URL with an absolute path
url-type.file-rel: File URL with a relative path
